BUTTONS.AUTO_MERGE_LOTS_TOOLTIP: Automatically merge all lots with exactly matching label, inventory_uuid, and expiration_date.
BUTTONS.AUTO_MERGE_ZERO_LOTS: Automatically Merge Lots With Zero Quantity in Stock
BUTTONS.AUTO_MERGE_ZERO_LOTS_TOOLTIP: Automatically merge all lots with no current quantity in stock. It will retain the expiration date and expiration date of the newest version of the lot.

DIALOGS.CONFIRM_ACTIVATION: Do you really want to allow this user's system access
DIALOGS.CONFIRM_MARKING_REQUISITION_COMPLETE: Do you really want to mark this requisition as complete?  It is only partially fulfilled!
DIALOGS.CONFIRM_CREDIT_NOTE: Warning! The invoice you selected has already paid.  You must first reverse the payment(s) before you can reverse this invoice.
DIALOGS.CONFIRM_DEACTIVATION: Do you really want to revoke this user's system access
DIALOGS.CONFIRM_DELETE: You are about to delete a record.  This action is permanent and cannot be undone.  Click "Confirm" to accept or "Cancel" to halt this action.
DIALOGS.CANNOT_UNDO_ACTION: This action CANNOT BE REVERSED. The action will be permanent. You must be sure that you want to do this action.
DIALOGS.PLEASE_READ: Unexpected bad things will happen if you don't read this!
DIALOGS.UNDERSTAND_ACTION: I accept the consequences of this action
DIALOGS.DELETE_ROLE: Do you really want to delete this role?
DIALOGS.DELETE_SUPPLIER: Do you really want to delete this supplier?
DIALOGS.UNPOST_TRANSACTIONS: Do you realy want to unpost transactions?

ERRORS.AT_LEAST_1_COL: At least one column must be selected
ERRORS.NOT_CONFIGURED: Some lines in the grid are not yet configured.
ERRORS.HAS_ERRORS: The form contains errors.  Please correct them and resubmit.
ERRORS.MIN_CURRENCY_UNIT: This value is too small for the selected currency.
ERRORS.MISSING: This form is missing required fields (marked in red).
ERRORS.MISSING_DEBTOR_ID: Please select a patient before the invoices
ERRORS.RECORD_ERROR: Please resolve any errors on the form (marked in red).
ERRORS.LOCKED_USER: Your account has been closed. Please contact the system administrator to reopen your account.
ERRORS.PERIOD_ORDER: Period from should be before period to
ERRORS.PERIOD_DIFF_FISCAL: Periods should be in the same fiscal year
ERRORS.VALUE_LESS: This value is less than the minimum value
ERRORS.VALUE_GREATER: This value is greater than the maximum value
ERRORS.GRID_CACHE_KEY_MISSING: The cache of the grid is missing

INFO.PATIENT_VISIT_PENDING: The patient has a pending visit
INFO.CAN_NOT_BREAKEVEN: Can not calculate break even point
INFO.CHECK_DEFINE_COST_CENTERS: Check to determine the cost centers to be analyzed
INFO.CREDIT_NOTE_INVOICE: Credit Note reversing invoice {{ invoiceReference }} of debtor {{ debtorName }} ({{ debtorIdentifier }}).  {{ description }}
INFO.DISABLED_CURRENCY: This currency is unusable since there is no account set for it.  Use the Cashbox Management module to set an account for this currency and cashbox.
INFO.DISPLAY_NAME: The user's full name. This is displayed on any formal documents or receipts processed by the system.
INFO.DISTRIBUTION_INVALID: The distribution is invalid. The sum of distributed values must be equal to the amount of the transaction.
INFO.DISTRIBUTION_PERCENT_INVALID: The distribution is invalid. The sum of percentage values must be equal to 100%
INFO.FIXED_INFO: This value is fixed and cannot be updated
INFO.GROUPS_DEBTOR: Assign a new debtor group from the options below. Press 'confirm' to permanently update the patient's debtor group
INFO.GROUPS_PATIENT: Assign the patient to patient groups from the options below. Press 'confirm' to permanently update the patient's subscribed groups.
INFO.IS_ASSOCIATED_EMPLOYEE: will be associated with the employee ID
INFO.IS_DISCOUNT: Is it a deduction or an addition?
INFO.IS_PERCENT: This rubric is expressed in Percentage
INFO.ITEMS_FULL: There are no additional inventory items that be assigned to this invoice.
INFO.NO_CHANGE: No changes have been made to the form
INFO.NOT_CONFIGURED: The accounts for this currency have not been configured yet.
INFO.NO_INVENTORY_PO: No products in stock have reached their re-order limit.
INFO.NO_PRINCIPAL_COST_CENTER: No Principal Cost Center has been defined
INFO.NO_RECIPIENT: An invoice must have a recipient before assigning items.
INFO.NO_RECORDS_DATABASE: There are no records in the database for this query
INFO.NO_SUPPLIER: A purchase order must have a supplier before specifying items.
INFO.NUMBER_PACKAGE_INFO: For products or items that come with packaging, you must enter the total number of packages or boxes, this quantity multiplied by the size of the packaging to obtain the global quantity by the smallest unit.
INFO.PACKAGE_UNIT_COST_INFO: The unit cost of the package calculates the unit cost for the smallest unit by dividing by the size of the package
INFO.PACK_SIZE_INFO: Corresponds to the size of the packaging, the number of items contained in the package or box, generally we find B10, B20, B50, B100, B500 or B1000
INFO.PATIENT_SUCC_TRANSFERRED: The patient's image was successfully uploaded.
INFO.PATIENT_INVOICE_NOT_FOUND: No invoices found for the patient: {{name}}
INFO.RECORD_SAME: No changes have been made to the form

REQUISITION.DONE: The requisition can no longer be completed and will be considered done

INFO.SET_EXCHANGE_CONVERSION: Set the exchange rate for the conversion
INFO.SETTING_PAYMENT_CURRENCY: An employee's payment setup can only be done with the enterprise's currency
INFO.TAG_NUMBERS_TO_GENERATE: Generates unique tag numbers that you can put on your goods before counting them in your stock
INFO.THIS_INVOICE_NO_STOCK: This invoice does not concern any item in stock
INFO.THIS_PATIENT_NOT_BILLED: This patient has not yet been billed
INFO.TRANSACTION_REVER_SUCCESS: This transaction was reversed with success
INFO.USERNAME: This is the user's identifier for the system, it should be short and memorable and will be used every time they log in.
INFO.UPLOAD_PICTURE_FAILED: The selected file is not a picture
INFO.USER_CASHBOX: These are the cashboxes that you have permission to manage
INFO.USER_DEPOT: These are the depots that you have permission to manage
INFO.USE_PATIENT_VISIT: Use case numbers from patient visit management
INFO.USE_INDICATOR_DASHBOARD: Use case numbers from indicator dashboard
INFO.VALIDATE_DISTRIBUTION: Please click here to validate the distribution of all Ancillary Cost Centers to the Main Cost Centers according to the respective distribution keys

LABELS.MIN_MONTHS_SECURITY_STOCK: Minimum number of months of security stock

LABELS.NO_FISCALYEAR_REGISTERED: There are no fiscal years registered so far! Click 'Create a Fiscal Year' to add your first fiscal year
